description: Detects suspicious processes including shells spawnd from WinRM host process
name: Suspicious Processes Spawned by WinRM
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\wsmprovhost.exe AND process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\wsl.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\whoami.exe OR *\\bitsadmin.exe))
author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
Markus Neis
